news.title: Coal Mining Environmental Restoration and Tribal Rights
news.content: Meghalaya High Court orders comprehensive environmental restoration of coal mining areas and ensures protection of tribal land rights, emphasizing sustainable development practices.

news.title: Forest Conservation and Biodiversity Protection Guidelines
news.content: The court issues strict guidelines for forest conservation in Meghalaya's biodiversity hotspots, regulating deforestation and promoting community-based conservation initiatives.

news.title: Traditional Governance Systems and Modern Administration
news.content: Meghalaya High Court provides framework for integrating traditional tribal governance systems with modern administrative structures, respecting customary laws and practices.
